titles.title: Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1994
A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Corning National Fish Hatchery to the State of Arkansas.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4734)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 4/21/1994--Introduced. Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Arkansas, without reimbursement, the Corning National Fish Hatchery (popularly known as the William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery) near Corning, Arkansas.
